experiences.title: Web Developer
experiences.subtitle: VIP Shipping LLC
workDescription: Design and establish a user‑friendly website, including an optimized home page, resulting in a 30% increase in user clicks and subsequently 15% in customer services.
Provide adequate training to 10+ staff members and 2+ junior web developers in internal web functions, including steps on how to make minor updates/changes independently.
Establish an interactive and dynamic website that guarantees high traffic, page views, and maximum user experience, generating a 20% increase in the company’s SEO optimization.
Formulated and implemented improvements on cleanup processes and performance, minimizing loading time by 30%.
Devised custom responsive WordPress site that included advanced WordPress features, such as Advanced Custom Fields, Custom Post Types, and WordPress Customize API.
Diagnosed and troubleshoot different technical issues of the company’s critical clients by deploying updated knowledge of modern technologies and techniques in the industry
